Class Game

public class Game
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Game​(int numOfPlayers)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addPlayerToGame​(Player p)
    If the player already exists it also provides to the player the proper turn number
    void drawAndExecuteActionCard()
    this method is used to get the actionCard from the actionCards' deck, add the action card to the other deck (the one containing only the used actionCards) and activating the effect of the action card by passing the entire Game
    DevCardSpace getDevCardSpace()  
    FaithTrack getFaithTrack()  
    int getLastUsedActionCard()  
    MarbleContainer getMarket()  
    int getNumOfPlayers()  
    Player getPlayerByNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)  
    Player getPlayerByTurnOrder​(int turnOrder)  
    boolean giveInitialLeaderCardsToPlayer​(int code1, int code2, java.lang.String playerNickname)  
    void mixActionCards()
    method used to mix the actionCards, in order to do that we need to: - remove the every action Card from the stack of usedActionCards - adding the cards to the deck of the usable actionCards - shuffling this deck

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • addPlayerToGame

      public boolean addPlayerToGame​(Player p)
      If the player already exists it also provides to the player the proper turn number
      Parameters:
      p - is the new player added to the game
      Returns:
      false ff the player already exists

    • getPlayerByNickname

      public Player getPlayerByNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the string containing the nickname of the player we want to look for in the list of players already in the game
      Returns:
      the Player associated with that nickname if the nickname match a player already in the game

    • getPlayerByTurnOrder

      public Player getPlayerByTurnOrder​(int turnOrder)

    • drawAndExecuteActionCard

      public void drawAndExecuteActionCard() throws SoloGameLostException
      this method is used to get the actionCard from the actionCards' deck, add the action card to the other deck (the one containing only the used actionCards) and activating the effect of the action card by passing the entire Game
      Throws:
      SoloGameLostException

    • getLastUsedActionCard

      public int getLastUsedActionCard()

    • mixActionCards

      public void mixActionCards()
      method used to mix the actionCards, in order to do that we need to: - remove the every action Card from the stack of usedActionCards - adding the cards to the deck of the usable actionCards - shuffling this deck

    • getNumOfPlayers

      public int getNumOfPlayers()

    • getFaithTrack

    • giveInitialLeaderCardsToPlayer

      public boolean giveInitialLeaderCardsToPlayer​(int code1, int code2, java.lang.String playerNickname)
      Parameters:
      code1 - code of first leader card (value between 1 and 16)
      code2 - code of second leader card (value between 1 and 16)
      playerNickname - nickname of player
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, false if for whatever reason it wasnt possible due to bad call
